text: Tara caya ye, tara yemana kaphera, tomara'o temani kaphera haye ya'o, yate tomara ebam tara saba samana haye ya'o. Ata'eba, tadera madhye ka'uke bandhurupe grahana karo na, ye paryanta na tara allahara pathe hijarata kare cale ase. Atahpara yadi tara bimukha haya, tabe taderake pakara'o kara ebam yekhane pa'o hatya kara. Tadera madhye ka'uke bandhurupe grahana karo na ebam sahayyakari bani'o na.
